column3: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
A good marriage would be between a blind wife and a deaf husband.

The real act of marriage takes place in the heart, not in the ballroom or church or synagogue. It's a choice you make - not just on your wedding day, but over and over again - and that choice is reflected in the way you treat your husband or wife.
Happy is the man who finds a true friend, and far happier is he who finds that true friend in his wife.
There is no more lovely, friendly and charming relationship, communion or company than a good marriage.
It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
Let the wife make the husband glad to come home, and let him make her sorry to see him leave.
A man in love is incomplete until he has married. Then he's finished.
A good husband makes a good wife.

I believe marriage is between a man and a woman. I am not in favor of gay marriage. But when you start playing around with constitutions, just to prohibit somebody who cares about another person, it just seems to me that's not what America's about. Usually, our constitutions expand liberties, they don't contract them.
My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me.
Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads, which sew people together through the years.
Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage.
By all means, marry. If you get a good wife, you'll become happy; if you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
The secret of a happy marriage is finding the right person. You know they're right if you love to be with them all the time.
Marriage is an act of will that signifies and involves a mutual gift, which unites the spouses and binds them to their eventual souls, with whom they make up a sole family - a domestic church.
Marriage is a commitment for life. It is a permanent, lifelong relationship.
When a man opens a car door for his wife, it's either a new car or a new wife.
Political promises are much like marriage vows. They are made at the beginning of the relationship between candidate and voter, but are quickly forgotten.
Getting divorced just because you don't love a man is almost as silly as getting married just because you do.

Same-sex marriage would eliminate entirely in law the basic idea of a mother and a father for every child. It would create a society which deliberately chooses to deprive a child of either a mother or a father.
If I get married, I want to be very married.

When people get married because they think it's a long-time love affair, they'll be divorced very soon, because all love affairs end in disappointment. But marriage is a recognition of a spiritual identity.
It's lovely being a parent and being in a strong marriage with somebody who is your best friend.
Every good relationship, especially marriage, is based on respect. If it's not based on respect, nothing that appears to be good will last very long.
One should believe in marriage as in the immortality of the soul.
